item.title: You can’t Trump the ALL-AMERIKKKAN BADA$$
item.author: Andy Djaba,
item.description: For obvious reasons, Donald Trump’s presidency and the current hostile political climate in the US has provoked a knee-jerk response of protest and defiance from hip-hop culture. A plethora of rappers have recently adopted a more political approach through their music and 22-year-old Brooklyn rapper …
